about_the_game:
In this darkly humorous fantasy Action RPG, three strangers awake trapped inside a single body, with no recollection of how this came to be. Your quest is to help them to permanently Asunder. All this takes place in an open world, with numerous sub-dungeons. Each night the Faceless will attack the main town attempting to kill the king, who's the only one that can lift your curse, the townsfolk do fight back but you can also construct defences to help out.

Two thirds of any Profits go to the Ukrainian effort.

KEY FEATURES

  • Switch between the party members depending on the situation, Also for a limited time you can Asunder when all your party fights together to bring down a specifically difficult foe. Though there is only a limited amount of time you can do this for, though you do gain time with each enemy killed

  • Its real-time but you do have the ability to pause and also view the scene from three different camera viewpoints in real-time or paused, 1. Isometric (normal gameplay), 2. A Birds eye view, 3. Behind the player

  • The ability to Craft Items, Cast Spells, Use Skills, Hire Mercenaries to Join your party. The maximum party size is 6

  • There are over 20 sub-dungeons, 30 spells, 100 creatures and 100 items

  • It's possible to complete in 10 hours, though its more difficult than other ARPGs eg Diablo, POE etc, As the cactus saiz "This ain't no gardening simulation". So you will need to save often. A normal player will take at least 100 hours

  • Once you gain enough XP to advance a level, head to the arena and battle your opponent/s (save first) Once successful you gain some skill & ability points to distribute

  • Though contrary to most ARPGs your strength is based on what gear you have

  • There is a Grimreborner stalking the world who after 3 days will resurrect any dead creature stronger, Keep away from him cause he will hunt you down, though if you do anger him, dunk into a sub-dungeon
